articles.description: JioBharat B1 features a 2.4-inch and comes preloaded with apps like JioSaavn, JioCinema and JioPay.
articles.content: Reliance Jio has launched its latest budget 4G feature phone called ‘JioBharat B1’. The new internet-enabled phone is the latest addition to the company’s existing portfolio of budget phones like the… [+1770 chars]
